author: Louryn Strampe
title: How to Stay in Touch With Friends and Family When You're Stuck at Home
description: It's dangerous to go alone! Take these apps and services to stay in touch and feel less isolated while you follow shelter-in-place or stay-at-home orders.
content: A few weeks ago, the phrase "social distancing" didn't mean much to most folks. These days, you hear it frequently. It's all about flattening the curve by physically staying away from other people to ensure that our hospitals have enough room for those who ne… [+2477 chars]
